meanings.definition: A small device inserted into the ear to block out noise.
meanings.sent1: I wore earplugs to sleep through the loud thunderstorm.
meanings.sent2: She always carries earplugs in her bag for noisy concerts.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the earplugs were tiny toys and batted them around.
meanings.sent4: In the quiet room, the earplugs transformed into powerful silence shields.
meanings.sent5: The bright orange earplugs stood out in the dark room, ready to muffle any noise.

meanings.definition: A pair of soft, moldable plugs worn in the ear to reduce sound.
meanings.sent1: My dad uses earplugs when he goes hunting to protect his ears.
meanings.sent2: The swimmer put in her earplugs before diving into the pool.
meanings.sent3: The earplugs felt like fluffy clouds in my ears, making me want to nap.
meanings.sent4: With earplugs in, the world outside seemed distant and hushed.
meanings.sent5: The earplugs molded perfectly to my ears, creating a snug sound barrier.
